title: Strava
description: Platform for tracking rides, analyzing performance, and joining clubs. Features segments, routes, and social sharing for athletes.

title: Mitch Docker
description: Retired pro cyclist sharing podcast updates and cycling life. Posts from Life in the Peloton and rides.

title: Demi Vollering
description: Dutch WorldTour rider sharing racing and training highlights. Includes posts from stage races and classics.

title: Tadej Pogačar
description: Tour de France winner posting insights from training and races. Features behind-the-scenes race content and team updates.

title: Juliet Elliott
description: UK creator covering gravel, fixed gear, and adventure cycling. Shares rides, gear, and event coverage across platforms.

title: velovelovelo_
description: Instagram account focused on cycling culture and visuals, featuring bikes and scenes. Curates design-forward imagery from the community.

title: pervelo.cc
description: Instagram account by Johanna Reif featuring rides, travel, and cycling culture. Personal cycling visuals and stories.

title: Marion Rousse
description: Director of the Tour de France Femmes sharing race updates and events. Posts include organizer perspectives and women’s cycling highlights.

title: Maghalie Rochette
description: Canadian cyclocross pro sharing training, racing, and cycling life. Includes behind-the-scenes race content and skills sessions.
